channel.title: How can i make it read a certain npcdrop?
channel.description: I'm trying to program Lootshare into my server which is a deltascape base and i need some help on how to make it read npcdrops.I looked through nochandler seeing if something might help there and nothing.It uses a cfg to do npcdrops(much more organized)..if you could help me, please..thanks.
